## Today's hypotheses

![](images/Analysis_2.png){.absolute top=-40 right=-50 width="120" height="90"}

::: {layout-ncol="2"}

::: col
<p style="font-size:28px;"> Last time we completed lab **24.Memory Span**. The hypotheses related to this lab that we will test today are: </p>


<ul style ="font-size:24px; padding-top: 15px;">

:::{.fragment}
<li> **Hypothesis 1:** The type of stimulus (*digit*, *letter*, *word*) will have a significant effect on memory span. </li> 
:::

:::{.fragment}
<li> **Hypothesis 2:** Memory span for *digits* will be significantly higher than memory span for *words*. </li> 
:::


:::{.fragment}
<li> **Hypothesis 3:** Memory span for *digits* and *letters* will not be significantly different. Similarly, memory span for *letters* and *words* will not be significantly different.  </li> 
:::

</ul>


:::{.fragment}
<p style="font-size:28px; padding-top: 25px;">  Please, download the [Memory_span_data.sav]{style="color: red;"} file from blackboard and open it with SPSS. Looking at what data is available to you should help you to get your bearings!</p>
:::

:::
